title: Total population of Bangladesh 2024
summary: In general Inhabitants in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Inhabitants in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Inhabitants in millions, about 164.88 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Inhabitants in millions about 163.19 was reached at Year 2017
min_summary: Overall Inhabitants in millions has increased over the Year.
Inhabitants in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
